description: Read thousands of book reviews by your friends and other Goodreads members, keep a virtual bookshelf of what you've read, and build your to-read list as you discover great books on the website.Goodreads is a free service for everyone who reads. We have more than 35 million members who have added more than 1 billion books.
steps: After creation app, you will receive apiKey and apiSecret

blocks.name: getRequestToken
blocks.description: Get Request Token using OAuth.

blocks.name: getAccessCredentials
blocks.description: Get Access Credentials (accessToken/accessTokenSecret), after getRequestToken use `/oauth/authorize` url.

args.name: oauthTokenSecret
args.info: The oauthTokenSecret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getAuthorizedUser
blocks.description: Get an response with the Goodreads user_id for the user who authorized access using OAuth.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getAuthorBooks
blocks.description: Get a response with a paginated list of an authors books.

blocks.name: getAuthorInfo
blocks.description: Get a response with info about an author.

blocks.name: followAnAuthor
blocks.description: Make the signed-in user follow an author.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: unfollowAnAuthor
blocks.description: Unfollow an author.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getAuthorFollowingInformation
blocks.description: Get a response using OAuth describing the association between a user and an author.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getBookIdByISBNs
blocks.description: Get Goodreads book IDs given one or more ISBNs. Response contains IDs without any markup.

args.name: isbn
args.info: ISBNs of books to look up.

blocks.name: getWorkIdByBookId
blocks.description: Get Goodreads work IDs given one or more Goodreads book IDs. Response contains work IDs without any markup.

args.name: bookId
args.info: Book IDs of books to look up.

blocks.name: getReviewStatisticsByISBNs
blocks.description: Get review statistics for books given a list of ISBNs.You can mix ISBN10s and ISBN13s, but you'll receive a 422 error if you don't specify any, and you'll receive a 404 if none are found.

args.name: isbns
args.info: List of ISBNs .(1000 ISBNs per request max.)

blocks.name: getBookReview
blocks.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget. The reviews widget shows an excerpt (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given internal Goodreads book_id. Reviews of all known editions of the book are included.

args.name: textOnly
args.info: Only show reviews that have text (default false).

args.name: rating
args.info: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

blocks.name: getBookReviewsByISBN
blocks.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget that shows excerpts (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given ISBN. The reviews are from all known editions of the book.

args.name: isbn
args.info: The ISBN of the book to lookup.

args.name: rating
args.info: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

blocks.name: getBookReviewsByTitle
blocks.description: Get a response that contains embed code for the iframe reviews widget, which shows an excerpt (first 300 characters) of the most popular reviews of a book for a given title/author. The book shown will be the most popular book that matches all the keywords in the input string. The reviews are from all known editions of the book.

args.name: authorName
args.info: The title of the book to lookup.

args.name: title
args.info: The author name of the book to lookup. This is optional, but is recommended for accuracy.

args.name: rating
args.info: Show only reviews with a particular rating.

blocks.name: createComment
blocks.description: Creates a new comment. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: type
args.info: The title of the book to lookup.

args.name: resourceId
args.info: Id of resource given as type param.

blocks.name: getCommentsList
blocks.description: Creates a new comment. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: type
args.info: The title of the book to lookup.

args.name: resourceId
args.info: Id of resource given as type param.

blocks.name: getEventsInYourArea
blocks.description: Shows events nearby the authenticating user or you can get a list of events near a location by passing lat/lng coordinates.

args.name: title
args.info: The author name of the book to lookup. This is optional, but is recommended for accuracy.

blocks.name: followUser
blocks.description: Start following a user using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: userId
args.info: Goodreads user id of the user you want to stop following.

blocks.name: unfollowUser
blocks.description: Stop following a user using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: userId
args.info: Goodreads user id of the user you want to stop following.

blocks.name: confirmFriendRequest
blocks.description: Confirm a friend request for the current user using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: declineFriendRequest
blocks.description: Decline a friend request for the current user using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getFriendRequests
blocks.description: Returns a XML with the current user's friend requests 'using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Page: 1-N page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: addFriend
blocks.description: Sends a friend request to a user using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: joinGroup
blocks.description: Let the current user join a given group using OAuth. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getUserGroups
blocks.description: Returns list of groups the user specified by id belongs to.

args.name: userId
args.info: Goodreads user id of the user

args.name: sort
args.info: 'Members' will sort by number of members in the group.

blocks.name: getGroupMembers
blocks.description: Returns list of groups the user specified by id belongs to.

args.name: groupId
args.info: Goodreads group id of the group.

args.name: listOfNames
args.info: List of names to search for. Optional, will find all members by default.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getGroupBySearchQuery
blocks.description: Search group titles and descriptions for the given string.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

args.name: searchQuery
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getGroup
blocks.description: Get info about a group by id.

blocks.name: GetlistopiasByBookId
blocks.description: Get the listopia lists for a given book.Version of list/book.

blocks.name: getCurrentUsersNotifications
blocks.description: Viewing any new notifications here will mark them as `viewed`.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: addOwnedBook
blocks.description: Adds a book to user's list of owned books.You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getListOwnedBooksByUserId
blocks.description: List books owned by a user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getOwnedBooks
blocks.description: List books owned by a user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: ownedBookId
args.info: ownedBookId is a unique identifier for the owned book (not a book_id).

blocks.name: updateOwnedBook
blocks.description: Updates a book a user owns.You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: ownedBookId
args.info: id of the owned book record.

blocks.name: deleteOwnedBook
blocks.description: Deletes a book a user owns. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: ownedBookId
args.info: ownedBookId is a unique identifier for the owned book (not a book_id).

blocks.name: addQuote
blocks.description: If you don't specify an author_id, it will try to look one up based on the author_name you provide. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: bookId
args.info: Id of the book from which the quote was taken.

args.name: isbn
args.info: ISBN of the book from which the quote was taken. This will not override the book_id if it was provide.

blocks.name: likeResource
blocks.description: Like a resource (e.g. review or status update). You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: resourceId
args.info: Id of the resource being liked.

args.name: resourceType
args.info: Camel case name of the resource type (e.g. UserStatus, Review).

blocks.name: unlikeResource
blocks.description: Unlike a resource (e.g. review or status update). You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getUsersReadStatus
blocks.description: Get information about a read status update.

blocks.name: getRecommendation
blocks.description: Get information about a particular recommendation that one user made for another. Includes comments and likes. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: createReview
blocks.description: Add book reviews for members. You'll need to register your app (required).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: updateReview
blocks.description: Edit a book review.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: deleteReview
blocks.description: Deletes a book review.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getBooksOnMembersShelf
blocks.description: Get the books on a members shelf. Customize the feed with the below variables. Viewing members with profiles who have set them as visible to members only or just their friends.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: variable
args.info: Customize the feed with the below variables.

args.name: searchQuery
args.info: Query text to match against member's books.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getAllRecentReviews
blocks.description: Get a response with the most recently added reviews from all members.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getReview
blocks.description: Get a response that contains the review and rating.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getUserReviewForBook
blocks.description: Get a response that contains the review and rating for the specified book and user.

args.name: includeReviewOnWork
args.info: 'true' or 'false' indicating whether to return a review for another book in the same work if review not found for the specified book.

blocks.name: getAuthorByName
blocks.description: Get an response with the Goodreads url for the given author name.

blocks.name: getBooksByMultipleFields
blocks.description: Get a response with the most popular books for the given query. This will search all books in the title/author/ISBN fields and show matches, sorted by popularity on Goodreads. There will be cases where a result is shown on the Goodreads site, but not through the API. This happens when the result is an Amazon-only edition and we have to honor Amazon's terms of service.

args.name: title
args.info: Title of the book.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

args.name: authorName
args.info: Author of the book.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

args.name: isbn
args.info: ISBN fields.Supports boolean operators and phrase searching.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getSeries
blocks.description: Info on a series.

blocks.name: getSeriesByAuthorId
blocks.description: List of all series by an author.

blocks.name: getSeriesByWorkId
blocks.description: List of all series a work is in.

blocks.name: addBookToShelf
blocks.description: Add a book to a shelf.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: bookId
args.info: Id of the book to add to the shelf.

blocks.name: removeBookFromShelf
blocks.description: Remove a book from a shelf.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: bookId
args.info: Id of the book to add to the shelf.

blocks.name: addBooksToMultipleShelves
blocks.description: Add a list of books to many current user's shelves.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: booksIds
args.info: Ids of the books to add to the shelf.

blocks.name: getUserShelves
blocks.description: Lists shelves for a user.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: createTopic
blocks.description: Create a new topic.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: subjectType
args.info: Either 'Book' or 'Group'. If 'Book', the book the topic is about. If 'Group', the group that the topic belongs to.

args.name: subjectId
args.info: The id for the subject the topic belongs to, either bookId or groupId, as appropriate.

args.name: folderId
args.info: If the subject is a group, you can supply a folder id to add the topic to. Be sure that the folder belongs to the group. By default, if the subject_type is 'Group', then the topic will be added to the 'general' folder.

args.name: questionFlag
args.info: Indicates whether the topic is a discussion question ('true') or not ('false'). Default is false (non-question).

args.name: bodyUsertext
args.info: The text of the comment that starts the topic thread. Can include Goodreads book/author tags of the form [book:Title|ID]

args.name: updateFeed
args.info: Indicates whether the comment for the new topic should be added to the user`s update feed. To enable, set to `on`; otherwise, default is not to add to update feed.

args.name: digest
args.info: Indicates whether the user would like to receive an email when someone replies to the topic (user will get one email only). To enable, set to 'on'; otherwise, default is not to add to update feed.

blocks.name: getListTopicsByGroupFolder
blocks.description: Returns a list of topics in a group's folder specified either by group id.

args.name: groupId
args.info: If supplied and id is set to 0, then will return topics from the general folder for the group indicated by.

args.name: folderId
args.info: If id is non-zero, this param is ignored. Note: may return 404 if there are no topics in the general folder for the specified group.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getTopic
blocks.description: Version of topic/show.

blocks.name: getTopicsWithUnreadComments
blocks.description: Get a list of topics from a specified group that have comments added since the last time the user viewed the topic.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: viewed
args.info: Indicates whether to show topics user has viewed before or not. Default is to include all topics; set this param to 'true' or '1' to restrict to only topics the user has already viewed.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getFriendUpdates
blocks.description: Get your friend updates (the same data you see on your homepage).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: updateType
args.info: :Type of update. Valid values are: books, reviews, statuses. (default all)

args.name: updateFilter
args.info: Which updates to show. Options are: friends (default - includes followers), following, top_friends.

blocks.name: createBookShelf
blocks.description: Add book shelves for members.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: updateBookShelf
blocks.description: Add book shelves for members.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getMember
blocks.description: Get a response with the public information about the given Goodreads user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: compareBooksWithMember
blocks.description: Get a response with stats comparing your books to another member's.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getUsersFollowers
blocks.description: Get a response with the given user's followers.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getPeopleUserIsFollowing
blocks.description: Get a response with people the given user is following.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: getUserFriends
blocks.description: Get an xml response with the given user's friends.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: page
args.info: Which page of results to show (default 1).

blocks.name: updateUserStatus
blocks.description: Add status updates for members.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: bookId
args.info: Id of the book being reviewed.

args.name: percent
args.info: Percent complete (use instead of page if appropriate).

args.name: statusBody
args.info: status update (required, unless page or percent is present, then it is optional).

blocks.name: deleteUserStatus
blocks.description: Delete status updates for members.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

blocks.name: getUserStatus
blocks.description: Get information about a user status update.

blocks.name: getUserRecentStatus
blocks.description: Get information about a user status update.

blocks.name: getAllEditionsByWork
blocks.description: List of all the available editions of a particular work. This API requires extra permission.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The Access Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.

args.name: accessTokenSecret
args.info: The Access Secret Token obtained from getAccessCredentials.
